item.title: Cheryl add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is a curious thing, Harry, but perhaps those who are best suited to power are those who have never sought it. Those who, like you, have leadership thrust upon them, and take up the mantle because they must, and find to their own surprise that they wear it well." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zaf贸n
item.description: "Books are mirrors: you only see in them what you already have inside you." -- Carlos Ruiz Zaf贸n

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zaf贸n
item.description: "Every book, every volume you see here, has a soul. The soul of the person who wrote it and of those who read it and lived and dreamed with it. Every time a book changes hands, every time someone runs his eyes down its pages, its spirit grows and strengthens." -- Carlos Ruiz Zaf贸n

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Children are happy because they don't have a file in their minds called "All the Things That Could Go Wrong." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Joy is what happens to us when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "In every community, there is work to be done. In every nation, there are wounds to heal. In every heart, there is the power to do it." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "We can always choose to perceive things differently. We can focus on what's wrong in our life, or we can focus on what's right." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Cheryl add a quote by JRR Tolkien
item.description: "End? No, the journey doesn't end here. Death is just another path, one that we all must take. The grey rain-curtain of this world rolls back, and all turns to silver glass, and then you see it." -- JRR Tolkien
